channel.title: bug on Postmortem
channel.description: Recent content in bug on Postmortem

item.title: Should We Write Tests?
item.description: One day, my friend wrote this in his timeline I guess he's tired for writing tests I know writing tests –both UT or integration tests– is boring and sometimes troublesome.

item.title: Exploding Image
item.description: On my last summer intern, I was assigned to a bug fixing job. It seems not a big deal at first. Only fixing timeout while uploading image. But, when I try to add timeout to 1 min, still got a timeout.
